unnormalised: Thik aseh, toh somebody so’dwi, “Holi bwikhango baswni san? Swlwngni bafai hudwi… jwngni bafai deya swdwbni bafai gwthar hudwi long weekend plan tangwn.” Haina?
normalised: Thik asey, so swnwmwnw sowdjiso, "Baisagwmari barhao hwjawi? Nwngni logwni thanw..." hawdwng.

unnormalised: Bao, kamar bandh, bhai! Holi 2025 ao March 14 & 15 ni santhao gwiyw. Colour hwthao gelanai bwkhangw Dhulandi ao 15 ni santhao gwiyw. Calendar ao mark khalam, alarm set khalam, jwngni bwthai bolao prep khalam. Da baswni approx. 9 months prep time manao! *Perfect* gulaal throw tangwn tangnwi swlwngni, Bollywood dance routine learn khalam, arwng jwngni boss ni wellness day ni bwkhangw 14/03/2025 o tangwi convince khalam. (Good luck thaksinw!).
normalised: Ooh, hagrao, bhai! Baisagwmari nwi hajaro brwisanifrai marci brwigwni aro brwibai gwiyanwi janai. Rang gwdwn gnangwi khelenani bagwi, Dhulandi, brwibai gwiyanwi janai. Nwngni bwkhwrang gwdwn gnangwi janwi, nwngni alarmo thikh gnangwi janwi, nwngni dai gwiyanwi swnam gwdwn gnangwi. Ina nwngwi dwiswin brwisanwi jaonwkhw gnangwi! Gulaal gwdwn gnangwi swnam gwiyanwi jatha gnangwi, Bollywood dance routine gnangwi sengwi, aro nwngni bosswi biswas gnangwi nwngwi "wellness day" gwdwn gnangwi marci brwigwni aro brwibai gwiyanwi swnam gnangwi. Subhw kamna nwngni thaonwi!

unnormalised: Dahwn jwngni friendni reminder: Holi officially start khalamnai Holika Dahan ao March 14ni gwbwnwi gwiyw, jaohao gwiyw 8:00 PM onwards thakwi maximum places ao. Gwjwo gwnangni. Don't be THAT guy jabw jwno Holi Dahanni dwthao colours hwthwi start khalam, alright? Nobody likes that guy. Ito family affair gwiyw, tradition respect khalam!
normalised: Dokhwnwi, swmai jwngna khwlaini: Baisagwmari adhikarikbhabai Holika Dahanwi jwnwm gwdwn gnangwi marci brwigwni jwnwm, janei gwmwi tham thaoni. Ina dhikhwini khelenai gnangwi. T-H-A-T nwi swnamgnw jakhangwi rang D-U-R-I-N-G Holika Dahanwi, thikh gnangwi? Swnwmwnw jakhangwi. Ina khelenai ganwi, samman gnangwi!

unnormalised: Toh hwmawi dwi. Holi: March 14 & 15, 2025. Dahwn thangwi, jwngni weekend plan khalam, arwng colours bright arwng hangover minimal gwiyw! Don't forget to hydrate! Arwng extra phone covers buy khalam… just in case. Oh arwng prep khalam excuses jabw jwno thakhwi March 17th ao colour hwthao cover khalam. Trust me, nanga gwnangw.
normalised: So thaoni thawo. Baisagwmari: Marci brwigwni aro brwibai gwiyanwi, nwi hajaro brwisanwi. Dokhwnwi jwngna nwngwi, nwngni weekend thikh gnangwi, aro nwngni rang swdwb gnangwi aro nwngni hangover jikh gnangwi! Dwkhw gnangwi gwjwn gnangwi! Aro extra phone covers kwrai gnangwi... jikh gnangwi. Oo aro nwngni dwkhw gnangwi nwngwi jakhangwi rang marci brwethwni janai! Biswas gnangwi, nwngwi thaowi.
